SELECT placeCode, placement, created, isPlaceUsed, p.floorNum,spotname,floorname FROM placement p join floor f on f.FLOORNUM=p.floornum join spot s on f.spotcode=s.spotcode WHERE p.isPlaceUsed=1 and p.floorNum=#{floorNum}

SELECT checkNum, checkin, checkout, c.membernum, name,re.reservnum,startdate,st.seatcode, seatname, st.placecode, floornum FROM checkIn c JOIN member1 m1 ON C.membernum=m1.membernum JOIN member2 m2 ON m2.membernum=m1.membernum JOIN reserv re ON re.membernum=m1.membernum JOIN stres s ON s.reservnum=re.reservnum JOIN seat st ON s.seatcode=st.seatcode JOIN placement p ON st.placecode=p.placecode WHERE checkin is not null and checkout is null and TO_CHAR(#{startDate},'YYYY/MM/DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
